Name: FIT Food
About the game: FIT Food is a multiplayer card game with a new battle mode called CUBE RUN. We developed it to make nutritional education at schools, universities, companies, and healthcare organizations fun and engaging. Tell your teacher and your friends to have fun and learn about food. What impact does it have on health, cost, and the environment? What is a Nutri-Score? You probably know more than you think - but there will be surprises as well. Play 12 game modes, including an easy BEGINNER mode, PRACTICE solo, the multiplayer CUBE RUN battle, as well as the challenging NO HELP and KNOW-IT-ALL modes. Also, try beating the AI-NPCs. Win a different trophy in each game mode. Collecting all trophies fast makes you the FIT Food Champion. Also, click on the question marks in the game, you will find lots of additional info and videos.
